person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. The first possible "Person" entity in the paragraph is "trade ministers." While the term "trade ministers" is plural, it refers to a group of people who hold the position of trade minister in their respective governments.
2. The second possible "Person" entity is "the WTO." Although the World Trade Organization (WTO) is an international organization, it is comprised of representatives from its member countries, who are individuals.
3. The third possible "Person" entity is "GATT," which stands for the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade. GATT was an international treaty that regulated international trade before the establishment of the WTO. It was signed by representatives of various governments, so it can be considered a "Person" entity.

Therefore, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are "trade ministers," "the WTO," and "GATT."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, based on the context of the paragraph, the relevant "Person" entities are:

1. trade ministers

The other entities, "the WTO" and "GATT," are international organizations and agreements, respectively, and not individual people.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. The first location entity in the paragraph is "the ministerial meeting." This refers to a meeting of ministers, but without additional context, we can't determine a specific location.
2. The second location entity is "the WTO," which stands for the World Trade Organization. The WTO is an international organization with its headquarters in Geneva, Switzerland.
3. The third location entity is "the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)." GATT was an international trade organization that existed from 1948 to 1994. Its headquarters were located in Geneva, Switzerland.

Therefore, the location entities in the paragraph are "the ministerial meeting," "the WTO," and "the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. The first location entity is "the ministerial meeting." This refers to a meeting, but without additional context, we can't determine a specific location.
2. The second location entity is "the WTO," which stands for the World Trade Organization. The WTO is an international organization with its headquarters in Geneva, Switzerland.
3. The third location entity is "the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)." GATT was an international trade organization that existed from 1948 to 1994. Its headquarters were located in Geneva, Switzerland.

Therefore, the relevant location entities in the paragraph are "the WTO" and "the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)," both of which were located in Geneva, Switzerland.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| the WTO |
| the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT) |

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: At the ministerial meeting , trade ministers will review the work of the WTO and the implementation of the Uruguay Round free trade commitments under its predecessor the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. WTO (World Trade Organization)
2. GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade)

These are the "Organization" entities in the given paragraph. The WTO and GATT are both international organizations that deal with trade and tariff agreements.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. WTO (World Trade Organization)
2. GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade)

These are the "Organization" entities in the given paragraph. I have removed the "trade ministers" as they are individuals who are part of an organization, not the organization itself. The WTO and GATT are both international organizations that deal with trade and tariff agreements.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| WTO (World Trade Organization) |
| GATT (General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade) |
